SEARCH

Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.dao

package it.unipd.dei.webapp.dao
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Provides support for the actual implementation of a DAO object.
    BanUserByIdDAO
    Set a new role for a user.
    DataAccessObject<T>
    Represents a generic Data Access Object (DAO).
    GetAllIngredientsDAO
    Get all the ingredients from the database.
    GetAllTagsDAO
    Get all tags from the database.
    GetRandomRecipeDAO
    Get from the database a ranomly selected recipe.
    GetRankedRecipesDAO
    This class represents a Data Access Object (DAO) used to retrieve the ranked list based on likes from the database.
    GetRecipeByIdDAO
    Searches recipes by their id.
    GetRecipeLikesDAO
    Get the number of likes of a recipe searched by its id.
    GetRecipesFromIngTagDAO
    Get the list of searched recipes from the user based on Ingridients and Tags
    GetRecipesToBeApprovedDAO
    Searches for the recipes to be approved.
    GetRecipesToBeRecoveredOrRemovedDAO
    Searches for recipes to be recovered or removed.
    GetSuggestionForSearchDAO
    Get the list of recipes with the closest number of Ingredients from what asked from the user
    GetUserLikedRecipesByUserIdDAO
    Searches for recipes liked by the user given his id.
    GetUserLikeRecipeDAO
    Check whether the user liked the recipe.
    GetUserRecipesByUserIdDAO
    Seraches for the recipes created by the user.
    InsertLikeRecipeByUserAndRecipeIdDAO
    Adds a like for a user to a recipe.
    InsertRecipeDAO
    Insert a new recipe in the database.
    LoginUserDAO
    Searches for users given email and password.
    RecoverRecipeByIdDAO
    Set rejected recipes as pending (null).
    RegisterUserDAO
    Insert a new user in the database.
    RemoveLikeRecipeByUserAndRecipeIdDAO
    Remove a like given by a user to a recipe.
    RemoveRecipeByIdDAO
    Remove a rejected recipe from the database.
    SearchUserByEmailDAO
    Search a user by his email.
    SetApprovedRecipeByIdDAO
    Set the status of a pending recipe as approved or rejected (approved = true, approved = false).
    ToggleUserLikeRecipeDAO
    Check whether a user has already given like to a recipe and then assign or remove it.
    UpdateLoggedUserDataDAO
    Change name and/or surname of a user given the id.
    UpdateUserPswDAO
    Change user password given the id or the email.
    ViewLoggedUserDataDAO
    Search for the user's data given his identifier.
